====nginx====
{{{
./configure --prefix=/home/soft/nginx-1.1.12 --with-http_stub_status_module --with-http_ssl_module
make
make install
上述语句报如下错
./configure: error: the HTTP rewrite module requires the PCRE library.
执行
yum -y install pcre-devel

报如下错
./configure: error: SSL modules require the OpenSSL library.
执行yum -y install openssl openssl-devel
}}}
====tomcat====
====指定编码====
{{{
tomcat的conf/server.xml文件中,加上URIEncoding="UTF-8" 
<Connector URIEncoding="UTF-8" port="8080"   maxHttpHeaderSize="8192" 
   maxThreads="150" minSpareThreads="25" maxSpareThreads="75" 
   enableLookups="false" redirectPort="8443" acceptCount="100" 
   connectionTimeout="20000" disableUploadTimeout="true" /> 
}}}
====设置内存====
{{{
window中的catalina.bat：
“echo "Using CATALINA_BASE: $CATALINA_BASE"”上面加入以下行：   
set JAVA_OPTS=%JAVA_OPTS% -server -XX:PermSize=128M -XX:MaxPermSize=512m

linux中的catalina.sh：
AVA_OPTS="$JAVA_OPTS -server -XX:PermSize=128M -XX:MaxPermSize=512m"
}}}

====修改session时间==== 
{{{
见conf/web.xml，单位分钟
<session-config> 
    <session-timeout>30000</session-timeout> 
</session-config>
}}}
====resin====
====添加日志====
{{{
resin.xml中找到<host>,添加
<stdout-log path='d:/stdout.log' rollover-period='1D'/>
}}}
